The image in question was originally sha: Kashmir Update' with the claim that it shows martyred Indian soldiers in Ladakh. This claim was widely circulated on social media platforms.
The viral image was also published by Ba: further amplifying its reach and visibility.
Alt News: a fact-checking organization, received multiple requests to verify the authenticity of the claim through WhatsApp and their official Android application.
Alt News conducted a reverse image searc: which reported that it shows Nigerian soldiers who were martyred while battling against Boko Haram. The bodies of the slain soldiers were secretly buried by the Nigerian army.
